Studying&Working makes life better.

Cease to struggle and you cease to live, and play life on hard mode.

I am Yuan Song, a Computer Science student in School of Computing of BeiHang University. The next year on March I`ll complete my master's degree. I finished my bachelor's degree on June 22, 2015, in Software Engineering College of BeiHang University.

My study interests cover Big Data (two years experience), Machine Learning, Mobile Development with Android and IOS(a little), Web Development Based on Django，PHP, and Scientific Computing with Python.

I support open source(@songdo), love Linux and Python. In my free time, I dive into writing, translating English book about technology, reading books to improve myself.
